Interface IGameController

All Superinterfaces:
InputEventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController, InputHandlerHarness.RecordingController
public interface IGameController extends InputEventListener
Interface for the main game controller. Extends InputEventListener to handle player inputs and adds level management capabilities.
See Also:

  • InputEventListener

    void
    setLevel(GameLevel level)
    Sets the current game level which affects game mechanics.
